http:request.doc:name: GET Appointment
http:request.http:query-params: #[output applicaton/java --- { "patient" : if (attributes.queryParams.patientId == null) "" else ("Patient/" ++ attributes.queryParams.patientId), "practitioner" : if (attributes.queryParams.practitionerId == null) "" else ("Practitionert/" ++ attributes.queryParams.practitionerId) }]

ee:message.ee:set-payload: %dw 2.0 output application/java --- if ( (not (isEmpty(payload))) and attributes.queryParams.startAfter != null) payload filter ($.start as DateTime > attributes.queryParams.startAfter as DateTime) else payload

%dw 2.0 output application/java --- if ( (not (isEmpty(payload))) and attributes.queryParams.startBefore != null) payload filter ($.start as DateTime < attributes.queryParams.startBefore as DateTime) else payload

ee:transform.doc:name: Save POST body to variable myInput

ee:variables.ee:set-variable: %dw 2.0 output application/java --- { patientId: payload.patientId, practitionerId: payload.practitionerId, slotId: payload.slotId }

%dw 2.0 output application/java --- { id : vars.temp.id, name: (vars.temp.name[0].given[0] default "") ++ " " ++ (vars.temp.name[0].family[0] default "") }
